content.raw:
Cool :) As Steven said, there has been a lot of discussion about the joint visuals for gzweb which can also apply to gzclient. A few comments:

* You used magenta, which might be hard to see if inertia visuals are on. That's why we went for yellow.

* Right now you only have a cylinder. Would it be too much trouble if you made a full arrow, a bit larger than the other 3, so it actually hides the other ones when overlapping?

* It would also be awesome to have the different visuals according to joint type, but maybe that's asking too much? hehe
